title: Production-ready Wayfinders pipeline + first episode output
description:
## Objective
Deliver a production-ready Wayfinders pipeline that produces a final episode MP4 and provenance bundle from a single command.

## Deliverables
- End-to-end CLI flow: scaffolding → generation → render → audio → QC → provenance
- `wf build final episode.yaml` produces `renders/final.mp4` and a provenance zip
- Episode 001 content that builds end-to-end

## Acceptance Criteria
- `wf build final episode.yaml` succeeds on a clean machine with documented deps
- Outputs are reproducible (cache + provenance)
- Example episode builds without manual edits

title: M1 scaffolding templates (episode + shotlist)
description:
## Context
The pipeline needs a standard episode directory structure and templated YAML to start new episodes.

## Task
Create Jinja templates for episode + shotlist scaffolding and define template parameters.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Jinja templates for episode + shotlist + minimal README
- [ ] Canonical episode directory structure (assets/renders/logs)
- [ ] Template parameters documented and validated

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] A rendered template results in a valid episode that passes validation
- [ ] Directory structure matches expected pipeline inputs

## Dependencies
None

title: M5 QC gates + reporting
description:
## Context
Production output needs QC checks and reporting for costs/reuse.

## Task
Implement QC checklist gating and cost/reuse reporting.

## Deliverables
- [ ] QC checklist report (kids rules + IP checklist reminders)
- [ ] Cost/reuse report from gen logs

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] QC report generated on each run
- [ ] QC gating behavior enforced per policy

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.5
- wayfinders-2gv.9

title: M5 provenance bundle packaging
description:
## Context
Final outputs require a provenance bundle for reproducibility and auditing.

## Task
Package provenance artifacts into a zip as part of the final build.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Provenance bundle definition (episode YAML, prompts, sidecars, gen_runs, render settings, QC report)
- [ ]  or integrated into 
- [ ] Zip output at stable location

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Bundle contains all required metadata to reproduce/inspect outputs

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.10
- wayfinders-2gv.5
- wayfinders-2gv.8

title: Orchestrator: wf build final
description:
## Context
We need a single command that executes the full pipeline to produce final outputs.

## Task
Implement `wf build final episode.yaml` orchestrating validation, generation, render, audio, QC, and provenance.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Orchestration command with ordered stages
- [ ] Idempotent behavior or stage skipping via cache
- [ ] Standardized logging + exit codes

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Produces `renders/final.mp4` and provenance bundle per DoD

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.6
- wayfinders-2gv.8
- wayfinders-2gv.9
- wayfinders-2gv.11

title: Production hardening: docs + CI + reproducibility
description:
## Context
We need documentation and CI to make the pipeline reproducible and production-ready.

## Task
Add installation docs, CI smoke test, and deterministic settings.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Install + config documentation (ffmpeg, wf.toml, deps)
- [ ] CI smoke test for a minimal placeholder episode
- [ ] Deterministic seed handling + version stamping

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Fresh clone can build a sample mp4 in CI and locally

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.12

title: Episode 001 content (episode + shotlist + assets)
description:
## Context
We need a real episode to validate the full pipeline end-to-end.

## Task
Create the Episode 001 project with episode.yaml, shotlist, and required assets.

## Deliverables
- [ ]  + shotlist
- [ ] Required assets or placeholder references
- [ ] Validated timing and pacing

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ]  succeeds without manual edits

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.1
- wayfinders-2gv.12

title: M1 CLI wf new-episode
description:
## Context
We need a command to generate new episodes from templates safely and deterministically.

## Task
Implement  with validation and safe overwrite behavior.

## Deliverables
- [ ] CLI command + help text + examples
- [ ] Template rendering + file writes + safe overwrite policy
- [ ] Immediate validation of generated episode config

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Command creates a valid scaffold deterministically
- [ ] Re-run behavior is explicit (no silent clobber)

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.1

title: M2 provider registry + wf.toml config
description:
## Context
Generation needs a configurable provider registry with explicit config and validation.

## Task
Define  schema and implement provider registry and config validation.

## Deliverables
- [ ]  schema with provider definitions and defaults
- [ ] Provider registry interface and selection logic
- [ ] Clear config validation errors

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Placeholder providers can run without creds
- [ ] Missing or invalid config yields actionable errors

## Dependencies
None

title: M2 prompt resolver + resolved prompt logging
description:
## Context
Generation needs resolved prompts recorded for provenance and reproducibility.

## Task
Implement strict Jinja prompt resolution and persist resolved prompts per asset.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Strict Jinja prompt resolver (fail on undefined)
- [ ] Resolved prompt logging per asset (text/json)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Every generated asset includes its resolved prompt in provenance

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.3

title: M2 cache keys + sidecars + gen_runs.jsonl
description:
## Context
Caching and provenance depend on stable keys and sidecar metadata.

## Task
Define cache keys, implement sidecar metadata, and append generation run logs.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Stable cache key strategy
- [ ] Sidecar metadata format per asset
- [ ] Append-only gen_runs.jsonl

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Re-running with unchanged inputs yields cache hits
- [ ] --force bypasses cache and logs a new run

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.4
- wayfinders-2gv.3

title: M2 CLI wf gen assets
description:
## Context
We need a command to generate episode assets with caching behavior.

## Task
Implement  using cache keys and provenance.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Asset graph detection per episode/shot
- [ ] Generation flow with cache-aware behavior
- [ ] Emits assets + sidecars + gen_runs.jsonl

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Generates expected assets for an episode
- [ ] --changed uses cache; --force regenerates

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.5
- wayfinders-2gv.3
- wayfinders-2gv.2

title: M3 cutout compositor (frames)
description:
## Context
The renderer needs a cutout compositor to turn Timeline IR into frames.

## Task
Implement core compositor features (parallax, camera moves, actor staging, overlays, simple fx hooks).

## Deliverables
- [ ] Compositor that renders per-shot frames
- [ ] Deterministic frame output directory layout

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Given fixed inputs, frames are deterministic across runs
- [ ] All shots render without manual steps

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.6

title: M3 MP4 assembly (frames -> video)
description:
## Context
After rendering frames, we need MP4 assembly via ffmpeg.

## Task
Integrate frame outputs with ffmpeg wrapper and standardize output settings.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Frame sequence -> MP4 assembly
- [ ] Configurable fps/codec/resolution

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Episode MP4 renders with correct timing

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.7

title: M4 audio support + final mix
description:
## Context
Audio mixing is required for final production outputs.

## Task
Add audio spec support and implement mixing + muxing into final MP4.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Audio spec in episode/shot config (dialogue, sfx, music bed)
- [ ] Timeline-aligned mixing with levels/fades
- [ ] Muxed final MP4

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Final MP4 contains synced dialogue/music/sfx

## Dependencies
- wayfinders-2gv.8
